testcase.name: Add a new Customer
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And click on customers Menu Item............................................passed And click on Add new button.................................................passed Then User can view Add new customer page....................................passed When User enter customer info...............................................passed And click on Save button....................................................passed Then User can view confirmation mesage "The new customer has been added successfully.".passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.name: Search a Customer by Name
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"..............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin"......passed And Click on login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And click on customers Menu Item............................................passed And Enter customer FirstName................................................passed And Enter customer LastName.................................................passed When User click on search button............................................passed Then User should found Name in the Search table.............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
